comments.author: Dave
comments.body: No me today. Taking an early lunch ro do a bike/hike Poorman w/ the illustrious and talented Kacey Jones. She has a free mid-morning block out of school today, so we're gonna' make the best. Have fun, and remember when the sherriff nabs you, make your feelings known loud and clear: "Don't taz me, bro'!!"

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: The Jonesenator and I ended up doing lower 4-Mile. We took the creek trail up Boulder Canyon, then jumped into 4-Mile. She loved it. I'm going to see if I can waiver her out of gym class and into the Frenzy... Canyon cruising beats 8-count burpees and dodge ball any day in my humble opinion. With Burton going over the fence (in the wrong direction, if you can believe!) soon, I'll be looking for new sparring partners. Beautiful day, wasn't it?
